name: Word Crusher
description:
This was a small game made for an assignment and so it wont be receiving any updates. There's a small bug with the difficulty UI in which changing the difficulty and then going back to the main menu will save the difficulty but not display this, so make sure to changes the difficulty to the desired difficulty before each play (Starts at medium by default).

Other than the above this was thought to be a small yet fun game for people to enjoy and shouldn't have any other bugs within it :)

Happy typing!
